ygData.messageBody:
Well you didn't go up enough floors . . .

Look around in the FREEPORT Science of blah blah blah WIZARD/MAGE/ENCHANTER
guild . .. .

There are like 3 floors and each floor has more stuff, there are TONS of WIZ
offensive spells on the 3rd floor,
So get on up those stairs and get ye some good Evocation spells . . .
